summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts an action scene in a video game set in a natural outdoor environment with autumn foliage, stone paths, and a traditional Asian-style gate in the background. A character is mid-air, seemingly attacking an enemy named "Daoist Mi," whose health bar is visible near the bottom center of the screen and is partially depleted. The user interface (UI) includes health and stamina bars in the bottom left corner, along with potion and ability icons. On the bottom right, there are additional ability icons and a circular minimap. The visual elements suggest combat gameplay with a focus on abilities and resource management.
